title: President to Award Medal of Honor to Retired Army Captain (US Department of Defense)
text: ( Source : US Department of Defense ) WASHINGTON, October 15 , 2015 - In a Nov. 12 White House ceremony, President Barack Obama will present the nation's highest honor for conspicuous battlefield gallantry to a retired Army captain for tackling
